channel.title: MBallSectionsDR
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MBallSectionsDR, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Tulsi Gabbard: The Bold Choice to Fix a Broken Intelligence Community
item.description: Her appointment would send an unmistakable message: The days of the intelligence community operating as an unaccountable black box are over.

item.title: RFK Jr. Is a Left-Wing Menace
item.description: RFK Jr. is a left-wing authoritarian, pro-abortion, pro-Berniecare, a man of proven bad character, and a menace to the health of Americans.

item.title: Both Parties Are Driving the Runaway Social Security Insolvency Train
item.description: An outrageous budget buster that’s heading for approval will blow a $200 billion hole in the trust fund.

item.title: Senate Armed Services chairman hopes to confirm Hegseth on Inauguration Day, sets hearing

item.title: NYT’s Bret Stephens, Hoping To Stay Relevant, Is Ready To Leave ‘Never Trump.’ It’s Too Late
